Detailed Description

Control the search settings on a media list.

Media lists that implement this interface declare themselves as searchable. The search is applied as an additional constraint to the list.

See also:
sbIMediaList

Definition at line 48 of file sbISearchableMediaList.idl.

Member Function Documentation

void sbISearchableMediaList::setSearch ( in sbIPropertyArray  aSearch  ) 

Set a new search.

Parameters:
aSearch A property bag of search parameters. The keys map to properties and the values are the search value for each property. A key with value "*" will search all properties.
